1176920.name: Lock 'n Load Tactical Digital: Heroes Against the Red Star Battlepack 1
1176920.description:
Heroes Against the Red Star Battlepack 1


Heroes Against the Red Star Battle Pack 1 takes you from West Germany to Paris, on the first days of World War III in 1985. You will command a bucket of 1985-era weaponry including Soviet T-80, T-72, T-64, and T-55 tanks Hind helicopters, Soviet infantry, paratroopers, BMPs, and all their accouterments of war - RPGs, RPKs, RPDs, you are free to do so.


Your forces represent French conscripts, the Foreign Legion, Paratroopers, and lots of tanks. You’ll match AMX30 B-2 tanks against the best Russian armor, direct Jaguar airstrikes, and recon enemy positions with ERC-90 and AMX 10RC armored cars. You get to play with anti-tank guided missiles (ATGM), which are easily depleted, advanced armor, advanced sights (thermal and night), fixed-wing air support, and much more.


Heroes Against the Red Star Battle Pack 1 includes 10 scenarios from the first probes by Soviet infantry to the ultimate, desperate clash for the Important road and Bridges. This is modern street fighting., in the buildings, on the deck of the tanks.
1176920.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 芬兰语, 日语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文
